title: Font sought
author: Sharkykzn

comments.content: It looks like (a destroyed by compression) **[Minstrel Poster NF](http://web.archive.org/web/20150317152816/http:/www.findmyfont.com/index.php/fonts/font-preview?fset=Nick-Curtis&ffam=Minstrel%20Poster%20NF%20-%20Regular&fid=c252d5cd6169eed1541d8e016109e34f&fsize=60&text=BARNEY%E2%80%99S%20ARMY&wrap=2)** by Nick Curtis [2001]
Thanks, that is it.. It has been compressed as suspected.
